entry.title: $2299 // Beautifully finished bathroom with large deep soaking tub
entry.content:
Call or text today: sixx for six for zero seven 2 1 5 2

Crown Heights, Brooklyn. 750 square feet, Pets Upon Approval. Nearby subway stations include: Botanic Garden, Franklin Av, Prospect Park. SOLID prewar walkup located steps from Botanical Garden and BK Museum. Separate Kitchen and Living space that faces the front of building and looks over your exclusive patio space where any amount of summer gardening and BBQ'ing is bound to take place. This apt is drenched in sunlight! Stainless Steel kitchen appliances. Queen size bedroom. Closets throughout. Beautifully finished bathroom with large deep soaking tub. Private parking garage available and backside of building as rec space.

Amenities:
Natural Light in Living Area
Private parking
Stainless Steel Appliances
Patio
Terrace
Shared backyard
Outdoor Space
Pets

Listing Number: 22809
